it.polimi.se2018.view.gui

Class ControllerGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.view.gui.ControllerGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewControllerVisitor, ViewVisitor, UIInterface

    public class ControllerGUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements UIInterface, ViewVisitor, ViewControllerVisitor
    the only class that link the Network to the Gui and vice versa.
    Author:
    Luca Genoni
